details: Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Gobball Dungeon.
Harvesters and craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Sufokia area.
Experience gained by fighting Pingwins is increased by 75%.
The quantity of wood harvested by lumberjacks of all levels is increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Dreggon Village and Dreggon Tunnels areas.
The quantity of tokens won from Kolossium fights is increased by 100%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Koalaks are increased by 75%.
Experience gained in the Sakai Plain and Snowy Forest areas is increased by 100%.
The quantity of Snowdrops harvested by alchemists is increased by 175%.
All varieties of Ivory Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
Shoemakers save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
A special repeatable quest is available today near the Brakmar gate. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
Ores of all types will reappear 100% more quickly than usual.
Experience gained in the Moowolf Lair area is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Lousy Pig Plain area are increased by 100%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Kwismas monsters.
The quantity of Kralove, Grey Sea Bream, Blue Ray, and Sickle-Hammerhead Shark harvested by fishermen is increased by 150%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in all dungeons.
The chances of obtaining loot from Kwismas monsters are increased by 75%.
Harvesters and craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Porco Territory area.
Experience gained in the Heroes' Cemetery area is increased by 100%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Pirate Boat and Castaway Island areas.
The quantity of Tender Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Kwismas monsters.
Kwismas Gifts have been added to monster loot. When you use one, you'll receive resources or random items.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Royal Pingwin's Excavation dungeon are increased by 125%.
Experience gained by fighting Kwismas monsters is increased by 75%.
Experience gains and the chances of obtaining loot are increased by 20% in the Kwismas Haven, Land and Taiga zones: a star appears every 15 minutes.
The quantity of Rye and Rice harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Dark Jungle area are increased by 100%.
Experience gains are increased by 50% for all craftsmen who can make consumables (Farmer, Hunter, Handyman, Fisherman, and Alchemist).
